violations.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color
violations.help: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color

nodes.html: lese mer om vår bruk av informasjonskapsler.
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 2.1:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #234484, surrounding text: #0a0a0a)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

violations.description: Ensure all page content is contained by landmarks
violations.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks

nodes.html: Hopp til hovedmenyen på siden
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Some page content is not contained by landmarks

  Some page content is not contained by landmarks
